Please use the guided issue form at `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml` whenever possible.
If you cannot use the form, include:

- Clear description of the bug
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs. actual results
- Environment details (OS, versions, browsers)
- Relevant logs or screenshots
